bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with hou bi 喉痹 , throat blockage. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 quoting from the main entry on Substance Entry sheng jiang 生薑：喉痹毒氣 , “Throat blockage poison qi”, writes: 生薑汁 … 咽腫痹 , “The juice of sheng jiang … [serves to cure] throat swelling and blockage ”. Yan zhong chi mai 眼中赤脈 , red vessels in the eye [1]

Pathological Condition identical with mu zhong chi mai 目中赤脈 . Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 109: 治眼中赤脈，癢 痛，時見黑花，杏子膏方 , “Recipe for a paste with xing zi to cure red vessels in the eye , with itching and pain, and occasional vision of dark patterns”.
